"A.P.239/5/3":
"Oh, <%me>.
Was hoping I'd get to run into you."

"What? What am I doing?
With the appearance of the [Profound Darkness], Darker activity has been increasing as of late."
"While I still have time, I'm collecting information. And don't ask, I'm taking it easy, so don't worry."
"But you're not, are you? Both you and Matoi don't know when to stop."
"Though I suppose it's because you don't know when to stop, is how you managed to save Matoi..."
"The [Profound Darkness] may be resurrected, but we're doing everything we can to keep it within Naberius."
"It's currently in a bind. It's really powerful, but since we can predict its movement, we can stop it."
"Once we've got our defenses setup to where we can handle both you and Matoi's absence; Xiao is intending both of you to Cold Sleep."
"Well, I also agree that you both need a break."
"Even if [Persona] absorbed the majority of the Darker photons, what you had to go through was far from normal."
"They want to examine your body and ensure you get a good rest. Hoping that they can return you to perfect condition."
"You and Matoi push your bodies to the extreme... I want you two, to take a break and rest."
"Speaking of Matoi. I need to ask you of something."
"1. What do you need?"
"2. Is this about giving her a present?"
"I was thinking about giving Matoi... a gift."
"What's with the strange face? Did I say something funny?"
"How did you know...?"
"It's just something to welcome her back, not just a gift in general, you know?"
"Plus, I've wanted to thank her, from long ago..."
"Knowing Matoi... she'd probably say something like \"... the thought is what counts.\""
"Ah, sorry... I know I've asked, but I don't need an answer."
"I think I just need to give her a gift of my own. Sorry to bother you."
